title: Press release: Minister for Armed Forces calls out Russian aggression during OSCE Ministerial Council
summary: Minister for Armed Forces attends OSCE Ministerial Council in North Macedonia to call out Russian aggression across Europe.

title: Guidance: Global Support Organisation overseas guides: Scandinavia
summary: A Global Support Organisation location guide.

title: News story: UK companies selected for NATO innovation challenge
summary: Seven UK companies have been selected to take part in NATO’s pilot challenges providing the opportunity to refine their products and keep NATO populations safe.

title: Guidance: Salisbury Plain Training Area (SPTA) firing times
summary: Information on Salisbury Plain Training Area's (SPTA) firing times.

title: Guidance: Defence Employer Recognition Scheme
summary: The Employer Recognition Scheme (ERS) encourages employers to support defence and inspire other organisations to do the same.

title: Press release: Introduction of Non-Religious Pastoral Officers for Armed Forces
summary: The Ministry of Defence has introduced Armed Forces Non-Religious Pastoral Officers (NRPO) to further bolster the support given to our Armed Forces.

title: Transparency data: Military court centres court listings
summary: Court listings for the Military court centres.

title: Regulation: MAA regulatory notices (RN)
summary: RNs will be issued by the MAA to notify the RC of changes in MAA owned process, or provide operational or engineering guidance.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1021: release to service authorities - roles and responsibilities
summary: RA covering the roles and responsibilities of the release to service authority (RTSA).

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1029: ship-air release - roles and responsibilities
summary: RA covers stakeholder roles and responsibilities and interfaces associated with the ship-air release process.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1208: flight data monitoring
summary: RA covering requirements to introduce and manage Flight Data Monitoring for Air Systems fitted with a Flight Data Recorder.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1210: ownership and management of operating risk (risk to life)
summary: RA covering the ownership and management of risk to life using a standardised approach and with regard to future risks.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1300: release to service
summary: RA covering the need for the release to service (RTS), its contents, defining the as flown configuration, limitations and the RTS recommendation.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1395: authorization to permit embarked aviation in His Majesty’s / MOD ships
summary: RA covers the authorization to permit embarked aviation in HM/MOD Ships, primarily through the 'ship-air release' process.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1600: remotely piloted air systems (RPAS)
summary: RA covering the categorization and regulatory requirements of RPAS.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1601: remotely piloted air systems open A1 sub-category (fly ‘over’ people)
summary: RA covering the specific regulations to assure the safe operation of open A1 sub-category RPAS.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1602: remotely piloted air systems open A2 sub-category (fly ‘close to’ people)
summary: RA covering the specific regulations to assure the safe operation of open A2 sub-category RPAS.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1603: remotely piloted air systems open A3 sub-category (fly ‘far from’ people)
summary: RA covering the specific regulations to assure the safe operation of open A3 sub-category RPAS.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1604: remotely piloted air systems specific S1 sub-category
summary: RA covering the specific regulations to assure the safe operation of specific S1 sub-category RPAS.

title: Regulation: Regulatory Article (RA) 1605: remotely piloted air systems specific S2 sub-category
summary: RA covering the specific regulations to assure the safe operation of specific S2 sub-category RPAS.
